body.name: Compact Makeup Mirror for Pocket Purse Clutch, 1x/2x Magnifying Foldable Cosmetic Mirror, Portable Travel Mirror for Beauty, Black Elegant Vanity Mirror for Men and Women
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 5 mins
features: 【Premium Materials】Metal + Glass + PU leather, features a folding hinge which allows it to be opened 180 degrees to lay flat or can stay at any angle you want, classy and sturdy, compact and lightweight, good value for money.

【Double-sided Folding Magnifying Mirror】Our classic vanity mirror with two-sided mirrors for easier and better makeup, one side regular mirror provides a clear true image, the other side 2X magnifying mirror allows you see with high clarity even the small details.
【Compact Travel Mirror】This mini handy cosmetic mirror is portable and easy to carry, can be placed in a handbag, pocket or purse, perfect for going out, traveling, camping and other occasions

【Thoughtful Practical Gift】 This black elegant pocket mirror could be an ideal birthday present or Christmas gift for your loved ones, like dad, husband, boyfriend, son, mother, daughter, sister, wife, girlfriend, grandma, grandpa etc.

【High quality】Made of high-grade textured PU leather and HD glass, crafted and polished to perfection, simple and modern design, you just need to put it in your pocket to make sure your makeup is always elegant and ensure you have a good mood every day.
body.description: Reason for buying and sellingThis cute compact pocket mirror for men and women is well made, portable size and ultra-thin make you easy to carry, so you can look your best wherever you are, these handy vanity mirrors are perfect for girlfriends, daughters, classmates, friends, moms, sisters and others as giftsProduct DescriptionMirror protective cover is high quality PU leather, textured and comfortable to touch; Mirror bracket is premium stainless steel, durable and unbreakable; Makeup glass mirror is smooth and clear with precision polishing process.Satisfaction GuaranteedAs a responsible seller, what we have been pursuing is to provide customers with satisfactory products and services, so, after customers buy and sell our classic cosmetic mirrors, please contact us if any problem, we will give you a 100% satisfactory solution and we will reply to you within 24 hoursPackaging Information1 unit black elegant vanity mirror

reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a economical mirror, just something cheap and this fit the bill perfectly. It's well made and affordable. It's basic, but that's all I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a beautiful sleek minimalistic mirror.
reviews.reviewText: As described, what you see what you get. I think it makes a nice little gift too.Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little mirror!
reviews.reviewText: I love this little mirror! It’s perfect for my purse. It’s nice and flat so it doesn’t take up any room and it opens easily. I have arthritis in my hands so it’s important to me that it opens nicely. It is well constructed so I think it’ll hold up well plus the outside of it is durable. Both magnifying and regular mirrors on each side for convenience. I would highly recommend buying this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good- could be better
reviews.reviewText: This will serve the purpose of a small mirror to keep in my purse. Could be better it it were thinner, lighter and if it stayed closed with a clasp or magnet.
